#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;

int render(int num, int base)
{
	if(base==10)
	return num;
	
	int i, temp, add;
	i=add=0;
	
	while(num>0)
	{
		temp=num%10;
		add+=temp*pow(base, i);
		i++;
		num/=10;
	}
	
	return add;
}
		

int main(void)
{
	int N, num, base;
    int i=0;
	char str[100008];
	
	scanf("%d",&N);
	
	while(N--)
	{
		scanf("%d %d",&num, &base);
		
		num=render(num, base);
		
		str[i++]=num;
	}
	
	str[i]='\0';
	
	printf("%s\n",str);
	
	return 0;
}
